snippet.title: Father, son found stabbed in Sydney suburb
snippet.content: A father and and his adult son have been found with multiple stab wounds outside a house in a western Sydney suburb. Emergency services were called to the house on Horsley Drive, near Curringa Road, in Carramar just before 3am on Tuesday with reports two people had been stabbed. The men were taken to Westmead Hospital where they are in serious but stable condition. (C) AAP 2017
